Message: Koodo: Great new text and data roaming rates as of August 28, 2014!  No purchase necessary when travelling to the U.S., just keep your phone ON to take advantage! U.S. & International text rates are changing from $0.60/incoming & outgoing texts to $5/100 outgoing texts + FREE incoming texts. U.S. data rates are changing from $5/1MB to $5/20MB. No changes to U.S. voice rates ($1.50/min).
